sentences.en: ...the case of an insurance company using multimedia to improve customer service in its branches.
sentences.cn: …一家保险公司利用多媒体技术改善其分支机构的客户服务的实例。

sentences.en: Ability to create simple movie and animations using graphic & multimedia software.
sentences.cn: 能够用平面 和 多媒体软件制作简单的电影及动画.

sentences.en: Adam raised the issue of multimedia applications and much useful discussion ensued.
sentences.cn: 亚当提出了多媒体应用的问题,从而引发了许多有益的讨论.

sentences.en: Methods: Use multimedia software as a supplementary means in experimentation teaching.
sentences.cn: 方法: 在生物药剂学实验教学中采用多媒体课件辅助教学,并观察其效果.

sentences.en: Multimedia is the combination of computer and video technology.
sentences.cn: 多媒体是计算机和视频技术的结合.

sentences.en: Multimedia techniques make this system user - friendly, more vivid and vigorous.
sentences.cn: 系统用户界面友好;多媒体技术的运用使系统生动、形象.

sentences.en: Multimedia video clips, animation, effect drawing and other commercial design.
sentences.cn: 影视拍摄、多媒体影视 、 动画 、 效果图、商业产品设计.

sentences.en: Now that you're writing a book, you need a fast, high - capacity display , with multimedia system.
sentences.cn: 既然你要写书的话, 你需要一台运转快, 容量大的机子.要有多媒体功能的.

sentences.en: Program that helps in writing hypertext or multimedia applications.
sentences.cn: 帮助写超文本或多媒体应用程序的软件.

sentences.en: The nature of multimedia teaching is still language teaching.
sentences.cn: 多媒体教学的实质仍然是语言教学.

sentences.en: The Network Multimedia CAI Courseware provides a bran - new teaching mode.
sentences.cn: 网络多媒体CAI课件提供了一种全新的教学模式.

sentences.en: These drove market of multimedia sound box exceed constant development.
sentences.cn: 这些推动了多媒体音箱市场的超常发展.

sentences.en: To explore how to make up multimedia courseware among medical professional teachers.
sentences.cn: 本文探讨医学专业教师多媒体制作课件问题.

sentences.en: Top name brand companies use multimedia advertisingto reach their clients.
sentences.cn: 顶级名牌公司多利用多种媒体做广告来宣传他们的产品.

sentences.en: Use this element to add multimedia to your XHTML page.
sentences.cn: 使用这个元素可以让你的XHTML页面中加上多媒体.

sentences.en: Wang Xi: the 3 g band width increased, the multimedia applications increased.
sentences.cn: 汪溪: 3g的带宽增加了, 多媒体应用增加了.

trans.tran_en: involving computers and computer programs that use a mixture of sound, pictures, video, and writing to give information
You use multimedia to refer to computer programs and products which involve sound, pictures, and film, as well as text
